property.name: 300 Regina Street North
property.introduction: These condo-like twin towers are perfect for everyone, including students. U of Waterloo, Laurier, Conestoga College - Waterloo, RIM, and all amenities are within close proximity! Enjoy the on site amenities which include BBQ area, sauna, fitness room, squash and basketball court, indoor swimming pool, games room and party room!

property.name: 200 Shakespeare Drive
property.introduction: In this high-rise building, known for its comfort and class, you can relax while enjoying condo-like living! This building offers spacious apartments with unique layouts, laundry rooms on every floor, large windows, walk-in closets, 1.5 bathrooms, dishwashers, in-unit storage, central A/C and electric heating. This is a well-kept building with beautifully landscaped grounds.
